name: March of the RedPenguin
description:
RedPenguin's chick is starving. Find her some fish by overcoming the icy landscape, freezing depths and hungry seals.

Created for RedPenguin. I hope you enjoy it, buddy <3

For Secret Santa Jam 2020. https://itch.io/jam/secret-santa

Sounds taken under Creative Commons from users OwlStorm, CmdRobot, InspectorJ, Mativve, ohforheavensake, BOAAY, EminYILDIRIM, soundbytez, soundscalpel.com and florianreichelt on freesound.org.
